attributes.action: Ensure that Oxford, and every other UK City / town, do not allow Islamic call to pray to be operated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have got to be seen to protect our culture, and if we are to have religion in our country than surely our nations religion is Anglican. Why should we be submitted to hearing foriegn tongues be blasted over loud speakers 3 times a day? If they need to remind their followers to turn up than surely they could use a text service? It should be set in law that we should be free from Islamic calls for pray. We require legislation urgently to protect our freedom, and our culture.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
